alert.note: Alert for Newton; Orange (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 07 at 10:29AM CDT until further notice by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana...Texas... Bayou Vermilion Near Carencro Bayou Anacoco Near Rosepine Neches River Near Town Bluff ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana...Texas... Vermilion River At Lafayette, Surrey Street Gage Sabine River Near Deweyville Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sabine River Near Deweyville. * WHEN...From Sunday afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CDT Friday the stage was 18.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Sunday afternoon and continue rising to a crest of 24.5 feet Monday morning. - Flood stage is 24.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Sabine River Deweyville 24.0 18.3 Fri 9 am CDT 21.9 24.0 24.5 &&
